mapper.sql: main_id, real_name, sex, tel_no, wechat, school, organization, introduction, first_choice, first_interview_score, first_interview_impression, second_choice, second_interview_score, second_interview_impression, third_choice, third_interview_score, third_interview_impression, final_department, enroll_status
mapper.select: select count(final_department) from enroll where final_department = (#{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and enroll_status = 502;
select count(final_department) from enroll where final_department = (#{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and enroll_status != 502;

select main_id, real_name, sex, tel_no, wechat from enroll where (final_department is null or final_department = '') and ((first_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (first_interview_score is null or first_interview_score = '')) or (second_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (second_interview_score is null or second_interview_score = '')) or (third_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (third_interview_score is null or third_interview_score = '')));

select enroll.main_id, enroll.real_name, enroll.sex, ( case when enroll.first_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and enroll.first_interview_score = #{score,jdbcType=CHAR} then enroll.first_interview_score when enroll.second_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and enroll.second_interview_score = #{score,jdbcType=CHAR} then enroll.second_interview_score when enroll.third_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and enroll.third_interview_score = #{score,jdbcType=CHAR} then enroll.third_interview_score end ) as 'score', ( case when enroll.first_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} then enroll.first_interview_impression when enroll.second_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} then enroll.second_interview_impression when enroll.third_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} then enroll.third_interview_impression end ) as 'impression' from enroll, enroll_pass where (enroll_pass.main_id = enroll.main_id and (enroll.enroll_status=501 or enroll.enroll_status=503)) and ((enroll.first_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and enroll.first_interview_score = #{score,jdbcType=CHAR} and enroll_pass.first_pass = 1) or (enroll.second_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and enroll.second_interview_score = #{score,jdbcType=CHAR} and enroll_pass.second_pass = 1) or (enroll.third_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and enroll.third_interview_score = #{score,jdbcType=CHAR} and enroll_pass.third_pass = 1));

select main_id, real_name, sex, tel_no, wechat, ( case when first_pass != 100 then concat_ws(" ", second_choice, third_choice) when second_pass != 100 then concat_ws(" ", first_choice, third_choice) when third_pass != 100 then concat_ws(" ", first_choice, second_choice) when first_pass = 100 and second_pass = 100 and third_pass = 100 then concat_ws(" ", first_choice, second_choice, third_choice) end ) as 'cross' from cross_department where ((first_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and first_pass = 100) or (second_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and second_pass = 100) or (third_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and third_pass = 100));

select main_id, real_name, sex, tel_no, wechat, ( case when first_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and first_interview_score = #{score,jdbcType=CHAR} then first_interview_score when second_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and second_interview_score =#{score,jdbcType=CHAR} then second_interview_score when third_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and third_interview_score = #{score,jdbcType=CHAR} then third_interview_score end ) as 'score' from enroll where (enroll_status=503 and final_department=#{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and ((first_choice=#{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and first_interview_score=#{score,jdbcType=CHAR}) or (second_choice=#{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and second_interview_score=#{score,jdbcType=CHAR}) or (third_choice=#{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and third_interview_score=#{score,jdbcType=CHAR}));

select main_id, real_name, sex, ( case when first_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and first_interview_score = #{score,jdbcType=CHAR} then first_interview_score when second_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and second_interview_score =#{score,jdbcType=CHAR} then second_interview_score when third_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and third_interview_score = #{score,jdbcType=CHAR} then third_interview_score end ) as 'score', ( case when enroll.first_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} then enroll.first_interview_impression when enroll.second_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} then enroll.second_interview_impression when enroll.third_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} then enroll.third_interview_impression end ) as 'impression' from enroll where (enroll_status=502 and final_department=#{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and ((first_choice=#{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and first_interview_score=#{score,jdbcType=CHAR}) or (second_choice=#{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and second_interview_score=#{score,jdbcType=CHAR}) or (third_choice=#{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and third_interview_score=#{score,jdbcType=CHAR}));

select enroll.main_id, enroll.real_name, enroll.sex, ( case when enroll.first_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and enroll.first_interview_score = #{score,jdbcType=CHAR} then enroll.first_interview_score when enroll.second_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and enroll.second_interview_score = #{score,jdbcType=CHAR} then enroll.second_interview_score when enroll.third_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and enroll.third_interview_score = #{score,jdbcType=CHAR} then enroll.third_interview_score end ) as 'score', ( case when enroll.first_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} then enroll.first_interview_impression when enroll.second_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} then enroll.second_interview_impression when enroll.third_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} then enroll.third_interview_impression end ) as 'impression' from enroll, enroll_pass where (enroll_pass.main_id = enroll.main_id and (enroll.enroll_status=501 or enroll.enroll_status=503)) and ((enroll.first_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and enroll.first_interview_score = #{score,jdbcType=CHAR} and enroll_pass.first_pass = 100) or (enroll.second_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and enroll.second_interview_score = #{score,jdbcType=CHAR} and enroll_pass.second_pass = 100) or (enroll.third_choice = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and enroll.third_interview_score = #{score,jdbcType=CHAR} and enroll_pass.third_pass = 100));
